Title: Handling It: Glowspore Grip
Description:
To craft something workable, we'll need a substantial amount of Zaralek Glowspores and some leather.

Here are my notes on the Symbiotic Glowspore Grip. Sharing this with a friendly leatherworker should give them enough info to complete a Crafting Order for you.
ObjectivesText: Craft or obtain Erden's Glowspore Grip.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Erden in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
